Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nauseate \Nau"se*ate\, v. i. [imp. & p. p. {Nauseated}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Nauseating}.] [L. nauseare, nauseatum, fr. nausea. See {Nausea}.] To become squeamish; to feel nausea; to turn away with disgust. [1913 Webster]
nauseated adj : feeling nausea; feeling about to vomit [syn: {queasy}, {sick}, {sickish}]
